article_node.title: Stocks, Bonds Rise on Growing Fed-Cut Bets
article_node.summary: Stocks and bonds rise as investors bet on a rapid Fed rate‑cut cycle ahead of the upcoming jobs report. President Trump has asked the Supreme Court to uphold his global tariff program, adding uncertainty to trade policy. European leaders are meeting Zelenskyy to discuss security guarantees for Ukraine, while Fed officials signal a cautious stance on future rate hikes. Robinhood CIO Stephanie Guild highlights opportunities in non‑MAG‑7 stocks amid market volatility.
